product_name: Timbuk2 Especial Medio Bike Pack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Timbuk2 Especial Medio Bike Backpack is bike commuting made easy: It keeps your gear dry, organized and ready for the transition from pedaling to paper pushing. Heavy-duty ripstop nylon exterior offers weather resistance and heavy-duty durability that stands up to daily use; water-resistant interior keeps contents protected. Flexible cooling panel in back maximizes airflow for optimal comfort while in the riding position. Padded backpack straps provide routing for hydration tube or headphones; detachable sternum strap eases your load. Waterproof laptop pocket fits computers up to 15 in. Zippered main compartment stores gear for a full day of riding and working; multiple external zippered pockets keep small items within easy reach. Water bottle pocket on the Timbuk2 Especial Medio Bike Backpack doubles as a holster for a bike lock. External zippered, gusseted pocket expands to fit large or awkward items. Closeout.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Especial Medio Bike Backpack is bike commuting made easy: It keeps your gear dry, organized and ready for the transition from pedaling to paper pushing.
